title: Silent Dragon [BBN][h33t]
description:
[IMG]http://img166.imageshack.us/img166/135/h33tpresentsss3.gif[/IMG]

Silent Dragon 6-Issue Miniseries
[IMG]http://img101.imageshack.us/img101/3717/5382400x600eo8.jpg[/IMG]

[quote]In Silent Dragon, Diggle focuses on a single, solitary warrior once again. His name is Renjiro, an honourable soldier in a futuristic world that is a combination of ancient philosophies and high-tech gadgets. He is the close friend and bodyguard of a powerful Yakuza boss of great ambition who seeks to unite the Yakuza gangs in a fight against government oppressors that have seized Japan in order to install a new world order. On the eve of a great meeting between the gangs, Renjiro learns of a plot to bring down his master and friend. Too late to escape, Renjiro is caught in a web of deceit.

Silent Dragon takes place in a universe of its own, a creator owned series in which Diggle has full control over his characters and their culture. The futuristic Japan he has created is a combination of the old and the not yet made, a place where ancient samurai values have been reborn and coexist with the likes of holographic messengers. It&#039;s a heavy and brooding place where Renjiro, a gangster&#039;s bodyguard, has more honour than the men who run the country&#039;s governments.[/quote]

Thanks to all the scanners involved.

IF YOU LIKE THE BOOK, THEN BUY THE COMICS OR THE TRADES. SUPPORT YOUR LOCAL COMIC BOOK STORES AND THE INDEPENDENT PUBLISHERS!!!
